channel.title: PokeMMO - Website [WIP]
channel.description:
So i would like opinions and ideas for my new pokemon MMO website :)
Features: Attack pokemon Explore Map system Friends List Level Up system Rank system and all basic Pokemon features
Screenshots:
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/11qk17o.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/34j1y8i.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/27xlaas.png[/img]
Also i will be having event like Double XP etc.. but let me know what you guys think about the design aspect including maps.

item.title: PokeMMO - Website [WIP]

The only reason you’re acting so brash is because you’re in a defensive state where you feel the need to act like an ass. Elaborate as to why? If you really did do any development whatsoever in the original source code why would act in such an unfashionable manner?

Just give credits to the other developer(s) and maybe they will lay back.

item.title: PokeMMO - Website [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:21, topic:536615”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=655428.msg4408741#msg4408741 date=1392846926]

@Vain_
Just leave it be. He’s a using a framework. Let him take the credit.
[/quote]no cause he lied and said it was his. i don’t like liars

He’s made his changes (I think). If somebody downloads a source from the download section, would you not let that person have any credit for adding onto it?

No reason to hate :)[/quote]credit for what they did; sure.

but i found two other websites with everything he claims to have as well.
i don’t care if he downloaded it and ripped it, credit should be given where it’s due.
not lying and calling people names because he’s a liar

[quote=“JoshuaCoombs, post:22, topic:536615”]As a matter of fact I was part of the original development and yah it’s new cause I decided to add a lot . Which I’m working on just leave me be and you shall see what arises[/quote]what have you added in the last 3 years - that i haven’t found on the other two sites?

item.title: PokeMMO - Website [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

so pokemon-hero was a community project?
and you’re claiming it as your own now?

i just find it weird that pokemon-hero is registered under the name Key-Systems GmbH from mijndomein for a few years now
and coombsdesigns.com is registered under your name from godaddy for a portion of the time.

you claimed “my new pokemon MMO website” meaning it hasn’t been out that long.
if it’s open-source, and it was being worked on by only 4(now 3) people, you should have had access to the files.
instead of redoing everything, you could have just transferred the files (only under the assumption pokemon-hero is registered under the deceased coworker?)

if its your work, then just explain the situation to me?

Read full topic

EDIT: If you would like me to verify please message me on RageZone

IG:KiruHoshino
